name: Starship Arena (Bertie)
description:
Fix Commands:
"fix.engine" = Fixes Engine.
"fix.weapons" = Fixes Weapons.

Overload Commands:
"ol.engine" = overload engine.
"ol.weapons" = overload weapons.

Start and manage an uprising starship arena team.

Invest in research and development, then build stronger and faster starships to work your way up the rankings and become the starship arena world champion!
